com.cigital.insecurepay.DBHelper

Class LoginDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.DBHelper
        • com.cigital.insecurepay.DBHelper.LoginDBHelper

  • public class LoginDBHelper
extends DBHelper
    LoginDBHelper is a class that extends DBHelper that is used to keep track of login attempts and account lockout status in 'LoginTrials' table.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.cigital.insecurepay.common.DBHelper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTrial(java.lang.String username)
      addTrial is a function that is called to make entry in table when first unsuccessful login attempt is made.
      void deleteTrial(java.lang.String username)
      deleteTrial is a function that is called to delete the entry from table on successful login.
      org.joda.time.DateTime getTimestamp(java.lang.String username)
      getTimestamp is a function that is used to get the timestamp when account got locked.
      int getTrial(java.lang.String username)
      getTrial is a function that is called to check number of unsuccessful login trials made to determine lockout.
      boolean isLocked(java.lang.String username)
      isLocked is a function that is called to check if the account is locked due to repeated unsuccessful login attempts.
      void updateTrial(java.lang.String username, int trialCount, boolean isLocked)
      updateTrial is a function that is called to update the number of unsuccessful trails made for logging in.

      • addTrial

        public void addTrial(java.lang.String username)

        username - Username used to login into the database

      • updateTrial

        public void updateTrial(java.lang.String username,
                        int trialCount,
                        boolean isLocked)
        updateTrial is a function that is called to update the number of unsuccessful trails made for logging in.
        Parameters:
        username - Username used to login into the database.
        trialCount - Contains the number of trials.
        isLocked - Specifies if the account is locked or not.

      • getTrial

        public int getTrial(java.lang.String username)
        getTrial is a function that is called to check number of unsuccessful login trials made to determine lockout.
        Parameters:
        username - Username used to login into the database.

      • getTimestamp

        public org.joda.time.DateTime getTimestamp(java.lang.String username)
        getTimestamp is a function that is used to get the timestamp when account got locked. If the time is greater than a particular duration then account is unlocked.
        Parameters:
        username - Username used to login into the database
        Returns:
        DateTime Return an object of DateTime.

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked(java.lang.String username)
        isLocked is a function that is called to check if the account is locked due to repeated unsuccessful login attempts.
        Parameters:
        username - Username used to login into the database.
        Returns:
        boolean Return a boolean value depending if the account is locked.

      • deleteTrial

        public void deleteTrial(java.lang.String username)
        deleteTrial is a function that is called to delete the entry from table on successful login.
        Parameters:
        username - Username used to login into the database
